synonyms.synonym: N-terminal cytochrome b5 and cytochrome b5 oxidoreductase domain-containing protein

protein.specific_function: NADH-cytochrome b5 reductase involved in endoplasmic reticulum stress response pathway. Plays a critical role in protecting pancreatic beta-cells against oxidant stress, possibly by protecting the cell from excess buildup of reactive oxygen species (ROS). Reduces a variety of substrates in vitro, such as cytochrome c, feericyanide and methemoglobin.

go_class.description: generation of precursor metabolites and energy
